import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; import successImg from "./assets/success.png"; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", occupation: "", email: "", whatsapp: "", topic: "", datetime: "", }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // 1️⃣ Send confirmation to user emailjs .send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_5qmfosa", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ) .then(() => console.log("Confirmation sent")); // 2️⃣ Alert admin emailjs .send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_nzvxr9o", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, whatsapp: formData.whatsapp, topic: formData.topic, datetime: formData.datetime, }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ) .then(() => console.log("Alert sent to admin")); setSubmitted(true); }; return (
